content: *all my designs are free to download if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to your local humane society or animal care organization * little buds is a reversible assigned pooling design ideal for semi-solid or tonal yarns with a small section of high contrast color with this type of design you assign one stitch to the main color and a different stitch to the contrast color this design assigns garter stitch to the the main color and bud stitch to the contrast color to create a cute little scarf with random pops of color little buds is knit diagonally and the size is adjustable the look of your scarf will depend on the yarn you use sample scarf knit knit with wollmeise pure in ap miriel enjoy **materials** fingering weight yarn 525 meters / 570 yards for a small scarf as shown more for a larger scarf knit until you run out of yarn use assigned pooling yarn or select a yarn with approximately 10% to 20% section of high contrast color 3 00mm us 2 5 / uk 11 knitting needles 1 stitch marker **measurements** approximate after blocking 60 inches across neck edge 13 inches neck edge to center point **pattern information** number of pages 3 language s english instructions written photos 2 schematic 1 photos of assigned pooling yarns for inspiration 5 & 6 arctic crafts by bente etsy snow buds in stock custom orders available 7 & 8 color of my fiber various colors etsy in stock custom orders available 9 & 10 wollmeise pure ap miriel in stock 11 & 12 yani handmade etsy my mother s violets and under the sea in stock 13 & 14 natpicar etsy in stock 15 & 16 blue barn fiber just the tip blue blooms preorder and custom orders available 17 & 18 inky fingers coconut ice smolder etsy in stock 19 mountain colors loganberry order
